title: Professional Baby Sitting Service
description: Trained and trusted babysitters provide safe and caring support for your children at home for hourly or daily duration.

title: Elderly Care Service
description: Reliable elderly care with daily assistance, companionship, medication reminders, and personal care at home.

title: Special Care for Sick Persons
description: Dedicated caregivers for sick or recovering patients, ensuring proper care, hygiene, and medical support at home.

title: Flexible Booking & Scheduling
description: Book care services easily based on your preferred time, duration, and location with instant cost calculation.

title: Verified & Trusted Caregivers
description: All caregivers are NID verified, trained, and background-checked to ensure maximum safety and trust.

title: Secure Home Care Service
description: Safe and reliable in-home caregiving services with real-time booking tracking and support.
